metadata.title: CVE-2016-0751 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: actionpack/lib/action_dispatch/http/mime_type.rb in Action Pack in Ruby onRails before 3.2.22.1, 4.0.x and 4.1.x before 4.1.14.1, 4.2.x before4.2.5.1, and 5.x before 5.0.0.beta1.1 does not properly restrict use of theMIME type cache, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(memory consumption) via a crafted HTTP Accept header.

criterions.comment: ruby-actionpack-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
rails-4.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
